data.title: Allegiant announces new route from Flint to Florida
data.meta_description: Airline service, Allegiant, announced eight new nonstop routes to 13 cities around the country on Tuesday, July 16.
data.text:
FLINT, Mich. (WNEM) - Airline service, Allegiant, announced eight new nonstop routes to 13 cities around the country on Tuesday, July 16.

To celebrate, the company is offering one-way fares as low as $59.

Beginning Nov. 15, 2024, Flint Bishop International Airport (FNT) will service trips to Destin-Fort Walton Beach Airport (VPS) in Florida.

“The addition of new routes is a testament to the success of our existing service in these communities,” said Drew Wells, Allegiant’s chief revenue officer. “Our network planning team is responsive to consumer demand, constantly looking for opportunities to enhance the leisure travel experience. The new service kicks off just in time to plan warm winter getaways to sought-after coastal destinations.”

“Destin/Fort Walton Beach makes 10 nonstop destinations with Allegiant, further cementing their already strong commitment to our community,” Nino Sapone, Flint Bishop’s CEO, said. “We are proud to partner with Allegiant and offer the region affordable travel options and opportunities to reach their favorite destinations.

Allegiant’s full network expansion announced today includes 11 additional cities. New nonstop routes include:

Palm Beach International Airport (PBI) in Florida from Grand Rapids’ Gerald R. Ford International Airport (GRR) begins Nov. 14, 2024.

Savannah/Hilton Head International Airport (SAV) in Georgia from Punta Gorda/Ft. Myers, Florida via Punta Gorda Airport (PGD) begins Nov. 14.

Savannah/Hilton Head International Airport in Georgia from Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport (FLL) begins Nov. 15.

Savannah/Hilton Head International Airport in Georgia from St. Pete-Clearwater International Airport (PIE) begins Nov. 15.

Melbourne Orlando International Airport (MLB) in Florida from Cincinnati’s Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky International Airport (CVG) begins Nov. 15.

Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport (FLL) in Florida from Savannah, Georgia begins Nov. 15.

Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport in Florida from Newburgh, New York via New York Stewart International Airport (SWF) begins Nov. 15.

Sarasota Bradenton International Airport (SRQ) in Florida from Portsmouth, New Hampshire via Portsmouth International Airport at Pease (PSM) begins Nov. 23.

Flights must be purchased by July 17, 2024 for travel by Feb. 10, 2025, Allegiant said.

For more details, optional services and baggage fees, please visit allegiant.com.
